The project registration must be completed by May 31 (summer semester) or November 30 (winter semester). Otherwise, a separate signature from Ms. Prof. Dr.-Ing. Kowal is required. Upon registration, the "Declaration of Project Work (
)" document must be filled out and submitted to the project supervisor.
